mapper.select: select * from payment where customer = #{customer} and (status = '결제완료' or status = '배송준비' or status = '배송중' or status = '배송완료') order by paydate desc
select * from payment where customer = #{customer} and (status = '결제취소' or status = '취소진행중' or status = '반품' or status = '교환') order by paydate desc

select pr.*, p.pname, p.options, p.category1, p.category2, p.category3 from (select pr.*, pb.title from payrequest pr left outer join proboard pb on pr.pbno = pb.pbno where payno = #{payno} ) pr left outer join production p on pr.pno = p.pno order by pbno

select * from payment where customer = #{customer} and (status = '결제완료' or status = '배송준비' or status = '배송중' or status = '배송완료') and (paydate >= to_date(#{todate}) and paydate <= to_date(#{fromdate})+1) order by paydate desc

select * from payment where customer = #{customer} and (status = '결제취소' or status = '취소진행중' or status = '반품' or status = '교환') and (paydate >= to_date(#{todate}) and paydate <= to_date(#{fromdate})+1) order by paydate desc
mapper.update: update payment set status = '취소진행중' where payno = #{payno}
update payrequest set status = '취소진행중' where payno = #{payno}
